headline: Does Imdelltra Royalty Deal Reinforce Royalty Pharma’s Long-Term Asset Strategy (RPRX)?
summary: Royalty Pharma announced it has acquired a royalty interest in Amgen’s Imdelltra from BeOne Medicines for US$885 million upfront, with an option to purchase up to an additional US$65 million in royalties over the next 12 months. This transaction gives Royalty Pharma a share in the worldwide sales of Imdelltra, a newly approved therapy for small cell lung cancer with analyst projections of more than US$2.8 billion in annual sales by 2035. We'll examine how Royalty Pharma’s investment in...
